frameset.edef: nominating , installing, putting in a position

example.parse: (S-HLN (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_NOM طهران)) (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تستهجن) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الخطط) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC الاميركية)) (PP (PREP ل) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_INDEF_GEN تنصيب) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ-2 (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN اميركي)) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-2)) (NP-PRD (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC حاكماً)) (PP (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_GEN العراق))))))))))))
